title: Comment 1
text: This is my first comment for this wedding planner, I am so satisfied with their services and design style!

title: Comment 8
text: The rose used to decorate the wedding place is so beautiful & gave me a memorable wedding. Also, the management of the transportation and guests is good. I love this planner.

title: Comment 9
text: The wedding meets all of my requirements~ The staffs are very kind and patient, I will suggest my friends to consult this planner too.
